topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c9eaa63687240a5dd0300#post_548c9eaa63687240a5dd0300
Auto-edited material is quite important these days. For example, an important jazz-funk combo from Barcelona, which has the very nice name of Pegasus, was back then an European jazz powerhouse. They often went to the Montreux Festival. 

But time does not forgive, and the record company they worked for folded... Their latest album has been made with donations from the fans. So is doing 80s soul one-hit wonder (and one of my fav singers) Gregory Abbott with his latest 3 or 4 singles.

Even relatively important people are publishing their own works. But this case you present is... Quite interesting from a librarian POV.
